name: Insomnia (itch) (Kromeshniy)
description:
Short first person horror game

You wake up in the middle of the night from a knock on the door, something strange has been happening lately, you need to find out what's going on

WASD - walk

E - interact

Shift - run

Ctrl - sit down

F- flashlight (if you have)

Есть русский язык.
